p-0: Services we offer to Corporate Clients Include:
p-10: Added services that CCS can facilitate include:
p-11: White Papering and Smart Contracts to ensure the compliance of each token you release with us;
p-12: Blockchain Development to get you the proper technical support and resources to build your blockchain software;
p-13: Third party Due Diligence of a professional blockchain legal team continually confirming the compliance of your contracts;
p-14: Signed Validation via GPG signed files for all contracts;
p-15: Dynamic Analysis providing a complete list of documentation detailing each function of the smart contract;
p-16: Vulnerability Testing which compares your data against vulnerable coding as it arises; and
